data.actual_result: Discord appears to refreshes, which will occur each first time you go into Direct Messages after you refresh your Discord
data.expected_result: You enter Direct Message without Discord appearing to refresh
data.short_description: Going into Direct Messages shows Discord refreshing for the first time you enter it
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on Direct Messages from inside server (You will need to refresh if you already experienced it prior or just started Discord, as you get put in Direct Messages initially)
